com.topjohnwu.libsuexample

Class ExampleApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application
          • com.topjohnwu.libsuexample.ExampleApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, ShellContainer

    public class ExampleApp
extends android.app.Application
implements ShellContainer
    The Application of the Example app.

    We implement ShellContainer to the Application of the app, which means that we would love our root shell to live as long as the application itself.
